descriptionHtml:
Hi, in this mod I tried to release a follower from character Trinity ( Carrie Anne Moss ).
Suport for light armor.
She is essential, donÂ´t die.
Melee Combat Dual Wielding.

She lives in the Temple of Kynareth, located in Whiterun.
This mod run over all DLC.

[b]
[/b]Thanks/ Credits:

I use Skyrim NPC editor and in pictures I used this textures for face and lips from navetsea (god work)

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5106


[b]Hair[/b]: Lore Styles hair set by [b]MacKom[/b]

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25395/


[b]Light Armor[/b]: Selene by Neo by [b]Meister aka Neovinci[/b]

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48077/


[b]Glasses[/b]: Elewin Real Sunglasses by [b]Elewin[/b]

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29432/


To install, uncompres .rar file and copy to "data" folder:

Trinity Matrix.esp
Trinity Matrix.bsa

To uninstall delete this files.
author: damelamochi
